info.author: Jan ONDREJ (SAL)
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
info.description:
This program is an email antivirus/antispam gateway. It is an interface to the
postfix or sendmail (or any other smtpd), which runs antivirus and/or
spamchecker. Its modular architecture can use any combination of
antivirus/spamchecker according to configuration.
info.keywords: antivir antispam virus gateway email mail
info.name: sagator
info.html_description: This program is an email antivirus/antispam gateway. It is an interface to the postfix or sendmail (or any other smtpd), which runs antivirus and/or spamchecker. Its modular architecture can use any combination of antivirus/spamchecker according to configuration.
